post.author: 이성기
post.content:
http://www.ibm.com/software/vadd/data/document2345?OpenDocument&p=1&BCT=1&Footer=1
This series of articles takes you step-by-step through a sample Online Banking System (OBS) based on enterprise Java technologies, from requirements through analysis, design, and implementation. It uses VisualAge�� for Java and WebSphere 3.02 for development and deployment, to show you how the author created a live demo that is accessible via the Internet. The system uses a lightweight servlet framework, JavaServer Pages (JSPs), Enterprise Java Beans (EJBs), and eXtensible Markup Language (XML).
post.title: Enterprise Java Tutorial -- Part I: Architecture and Analysis
